name: Heian Godan
description: The fifth and final kata in the Heian series, featuring the first jumping technique (tobi-komi) in Shōtōkan. Introduces crescent kicks, hook punches, and complex flowing movements. Known for its combination of quick and slow movements requiring timing, skill, and fluidity.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi) with fists clenched and thumbs on top of the fingers

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: Turn head left, move left foot into back stance with left middle-level inside forearm block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot in back stance, execute right reverse punch to solar plexus level

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: Slowly bring left foot to right foot in attention stance, turn head right, execute left hook punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: Move right foot into back stance with right middle-level inside forearm block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot in back stance, execute left reverse punch to solar plexus level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: Slowly bring right foot to left foot in attention stance, turn head forward, execute right hook punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Move right foot into back stance with right augmented middle-level block from left to right

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.description: Advance left foot into front stance with downward X-block using fists, arms crossed

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん しゅとう じゅうじうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, raise crossed arms and open hands for upper-level knife-hand X-block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おさえうけ
subMoves.description: Turn both hands palm to palm to right hip, then push left hand forward while advancing right foot

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance right foot into front stance with right direct punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Shift weight backward, rotate 180° on left foot with strong hip rotation, stamp right foot into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Simultaneously execute right downward block with stamping kick

moves.japaneseName: Hidari chūdan haishu-uke / Migi chūdan mikazuki-geri

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.description: Turn head left, extend left open hand at shoulder height, slow movement with inspiration

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん みかづきげり
subMoves.description: Immediately execute right crescent kick with sole of foot into left hand, pivoting 180° on left foot

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん まええんぴうち
subMoves.description: Continue rotation, place right foot in horse stance and strike right elbow into open left hand

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Keep right foot in place, slide left foot behind with heel up into cross stance, augmented block from left to right

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん こうほうづきあげ
subMoves.description: Move left foot back slightly, straighten right leg into L-stance, turn head and hips left with upward movement of both fists

subMoves.hiragana: げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.description: Rotate 180° on left foot, make high jump to land in low cross stance with downward X-block using fists

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Move right foot forward 90° into front stance with right augmented middle-level block from left to right

moves.japaneseName: Hidari gedan shutō-barai / Hidari nagashi-shutō-uke / Migi gedan shutō-nukite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだん しゅとうばらい
subMoves.description: Move left foot left with low sweeping block using left palm, right hand on guard

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ながし しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Rotate 180° on right foot with left flowing knife-hand block to right shoulder

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだん しゅとうぬきて
subMoves.description: Simultaneously attack with right fingertip strike, palm up, middle level

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Switch to back stance by bringing left foot into axis with left downward block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Simultaneously execute right upper inside block with open hand upward and backward

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ながし しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Slowly bring left foot to right in attention stance, rotate 180° left, move right foot 90° right with right flowing knife-hand block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだん しゅとうぬきて
subMoves.description: Simultaneously attack with left fingertip strike, palm up, middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Switch to back stance by bringing right foot into axis with right downward block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Simultaneously execute left upper inside block with open hand upward and backward

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: Step back to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi)

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
